cleaned_text: Full Calendar Online Meditation: Our online meditation classes utilize the Zoom video conferencing platform. After you register, you'll receive an email with the Zoom information. The Zoom info will also show on the event page (if you are logged in to your InsightLA account). To make an InsightLA account [click here](https://insightla.org/register/). To help develop and deepen your practice, join a [series ](https://insightla.org/calendar/?dates=&customdates=&locations%5B%5D=4684&teachers=&formats%5B%5D=68)for the best cumulative effect in the principals of the dharma that underlies all of our activities, primarily non-harming, we are requiring that all attendees be fully vaccinated in order to attend any in-person event. If you certify that you meet this requirement please select 'yes' on the registration page. To help develop and deepen your practice, join a [series](https://insightla.org/calendar/?dates=&customdates=&locations%5B%5D=24&locations%5B%5D=35&locations%5B%5D=32&locations%5B%5D=28&locations%5B%5D=other&teachers=&formats%5B%5D=68&languages%5B%5D=4189) for the best cumulative effect in a are listed in Pacific time.
